description: JSON schema for request context custom header schema for apps integrating with HNZ / Te Whatu Ora Screening FHIR API

practitionerIdentifiers.description: Identifies the practitioner using the application to access screening information

cpnNumber.description: The user's Common Person Number (also known as HPI Practitioner Index) in the form NNXXXX where N is numeric and X is Alphabetic

registrationAuthorityNumber.description: Identifies the practitioner by their registration authority/council number

raSystem.description: The system Url for the practitioner's registration authority/council

raNumber.description: The number issued to the practitioner by their registration authority

hpiFacility.description: Describes the health facility where the practitioner is located when accessing screening information

system.description: The system Url for HPI Facility Ids

value.description: The Facility Id where the user is located in the form FXXNNN-C where X is alphanumeric, N is numeric and C is a check character
